scenes.action_text: THE BACHELOR PARTY by Paddy Chayefsky FADE IN. EXTERIOR. STUYVESANT TOWN HOUSING PROJECT -- DAY. Under the credits, the CAMERA PANS slowly across the project, capturing the sober monotony, the endless straight apartment houses. Seven o'clock in the morning. DISSOLVE TO: INTERIOR.
